report.title: Individuals record data for verification
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record and associated individual information, excluding custom attributes for the verification 3 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id and o.deleted=false left join (occurrences_subject_observations oso join subject_observations so on so.id=oso.subject_observation_id and so.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms cttst on cttst.id=so.subject_type_id left join cache_termlists_terms cttco on cttco.id=so.count_qualifier_id ) on oso.occurrence_id=o.id and oso.deleted=false join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false left join samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where co.id=#occurrence_id#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

column.name: preferred_taxon
column.sql: CASE co.preferred_taxon WHEN co.taxon THEN null ELSE co.preferred_taxon END
